sentences.sContent: Also called adrenal insufficiency or hypocortisolism, Addison's disease occurs in all age groups and affects both sexes. Addison's disease can be life-threatening.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also called adrenal insufficiency or hypocortisolism, Addison's disease occurs in all age groups and affects both sexes. Addison's disease can be life-threatening.
sentences.sCn: 阿狄森氏病也称肾上腺机能不足症或低皮质醇症，该病可以在各年龄组群中出现且男女都可发病。阿狄森氏病可危及患者生命。

sentences.sContent: Also called adrenal insufficiency or hypocortisolism, Addison's disease occurs in all age groups and affects both sexes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also called adrenal insufficiency or hypocortisolism, Addison's disease occurs in all age groups and affects both sexes.
sentences.sCn: 阿狄森氏病也称肾上腺机能不足症或低皮质醇症，该病可以在各年龄组群中出现且男女都可发病。

sentences.sContent: The shortage in net weight of delivered cargo was due to insufficiency of originally dispatched weight.
sentences.sContent_eng: The shortage in net weight of delivered cargo was due to insufficiency of originally dispatched weight.
sentences.sCn: 到货净重短少，系原发货重量不足所致。

synos.tran: 不足，不充分；机能不全；不适当

phrases.pCn: 呼吸功能不全；呼吸衰竭
